about_the_game:
Make strategic choices, and climb through the amateur league to the first while making hard decisions to set everything in line for your club. Every choice matters and will affect future encounters. How will you decide on them?

Features

There are four main metrics in Regista: Fans, Money, Media and your Team.

Every choice matters, every single one of them will request something nonstop. It is important to keep all metrics in balance. When any of them reaches zero or hundred, you will lose control of that metric and either lose the game or be heavily punished by another metric.

So, do not give total control to anyone. Play safe, sometimes make unwanted choices but survive through seasons to reach the top! 

Your choices will affect everyone in your club from the bottom to the top. To stay in balance, you will make decisions even if you do not want to. Like firing your finance team or keeping your mouth shut about your players' actions to survive the season. Even risk your own reputation to keep the club intact.

Make transfers, keep your team happy and aim for a flawless season!

Through a season, you will encounter cards to improve your team's strength, morale and value. It is a risk and a mystery to always make the right decisions to gain that power or value your long-term gains and play safe.

You will be in situations that sometimes need to end in your favour. Use your items to gain that leverage.

Like making a last-minute transfer to even the strength with your opponent or bribing the referee not to lose your win streak, you may even skip a card that you do not like the possible outcomes of. Lastly, to save your progress, you can boost a metric to have the balance in hand again.

What will you choose?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS (Proton-8 Recommended)
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8 or higher, ATI X1600 or higher, or Intel HD 3000 or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Proton-8 Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or above
  • Processor: Apple Silicon M1 (M2 and M3) or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720 minimum resolution, OpenGL 2.0 Support, and recommended dedicated graphics card with 128 MB of RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card
